products.name: Almond Breeze Almondmilk Unsweetened Vanilla Chilled
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, en:almond-milks
products.labels: No added sugar, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from real almonds, providing a dairy-free alternative.","Low in calories, with no added sugars, making it a healthier choice.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Fortified with vitamins and minerals, ensuring quality nutrition."]

products.name: Thomas original english muffins
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Special breads, English muffins
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality ingredients for a delicious taste.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Baked using a traditional process for a unique texture.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact."]

products.name: Dasani Purified Water
products.facts: ["Dasani Purified Water is packaged in 500 ml plastic bottles made from 100% recycled PET (rPET).","The water undergoes a rigorous purification process that includes reverse osmosis and UV light treatment to ensure high quality and safety.","Dasani incorporates minerals like magnesium sulfate and potassium chloride for taste enhancement after purification.","Coca-Cola, the parent company of Dasani, has committed to reducing its plastic footprint and aims for all its packaging to be recyclable by 2025."]

products.name: Tomato Soup
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Meals, Soups, Vegetable soups, Tomato soups
products.facts: ["Tomato Soup - 10.75oz is typically packaged in recyclable cans, reducing environmental impact.","Many brands use non-GMO tomatoes, promoting sustainable agriculture practices.","The soup often contains natural ingredients, avoiding artificial preservatives and flavors.","Tomato Soup can be made with organic tomatoes, supporting eco-friendly farming and reducing pesticide use."]

products.name: Crunchy peanut butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Crunchy peanut butter contains crushed peanut pieces for added texture.","It is often made with minimal ingredients, typically just peanuts and salt, making it a simple and natural choice.","Many brands of crunchy peanut butter are made using sustainably sourced peanuts, promoting better ecological practices.","The quality of crunchy peanut butter can vary, with higher quality brands using fresh, dry-roasted peanuts without added sugars or hydrogenated oils."]

products.name: Super Extra-Large Peanuts
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Snacks, Legumes, Nuts and their products, Nuts, Roasted nuts, Peanuts
products.facts: ["Super Extra-Large Peanuts are typically grown in nutrient-rich soils to enhance their size and flavor.","These peanuts are often cultivated using sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","The quality of Super Extra-Large Peanuts is assessed based on their size, taste, and absence of defects.","They are packed in eco-friendly materials to reduce plastic waste and promote recycling."]

products.name: Strawberry on the Bottom Nonfat Greek Yogurt
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts, Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Contains no added sugars, using natural strawberry flavor for sweetness.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Made with high-quality nonfat Greek yogurt for a creamy texture and rich taste.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to support ecological balance."]

products.name: Balsamic vinegar of modena
products.categories: Condiments, Vinegars, Balsamic vinegars, Balsamic vinegars of Modena, Groceries
products.labels: Vegetarian, Vegan, European Vegetarian Union, European Vegetarian Union Vegan, Green Dot, PGI
products.facts: ["Balsamic vinegar of Modena is made from a blend of grape must and wine vinegar.","The production process is often eco-friendly, utilizing traditional methods that require minimal industrial processing.","Quality Balsamic vinegar of Modena is aged for a minimum of 60 days, with premium varieties aged for up to 25 years.","It is protected by PGI (Protected Geographical Indication) status, ensuring authenticity and quality standards."]

products.name: Bq.boeuf Prov.mo W.watche,
products.labels: Fabriqué en France, Sans colorants, Nutriscore, Nutriscore A
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality beef sourced from sustainable farms.","Packaging is eco-friendly and recyclable.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring natural quality.","Produced with a focus on animal welfare and environmentally friendly practices."]
